mapper.select: select bet_order_product_order_number,bet_order_product_product_id, bet_order_product_product_former_price, bet_order_product_product_name, bet_order_product_product_unit_name from bet_order_product where bet_order_product_order_number in ${orderNumberArrays} and bet_order_product_del_flag = 1 group by bet_order_product_product_id

select
from bet_order_product where bet_order_product_order_id = #{serOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by bet_order_product_product_type_id, bet_order_product_product_name

select
from bet_vehicles_customer left join sys_customer on bet_vehicles_customer_customer_id = sys_customer_id left join ser_order on ser_order_customer_id = sys_customer_id left join bet_order_product on bet_order_product_order_id = ser_order_id where bet_vehicles_customer_vehicles_id = #{sysVehiclesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ser_order_send_time like #{orderSendTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' and ser_order_type = #{serOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and bet_order_product_del_flag = 1 and ser_order_state = 4 order by bet_order_product_product_type_id, bet_order_product_product_name
